view.dscSearch: Selektim wanpela sapta i stat wok
view.lblBook: Plis, yu makim wanem buk i kam long lista bilong buk:
view.lblChapter: Plis, yu selektim wanpela sapta i kam long lista bilong ol sapta:
view.lblStatusFullyTranslated: Olgeta ves i gat trenslesen teks.
view.lblStatusNotTranslated: Nogat trenslesen (nogat wanpela ves i gat teks yet. __versecount__ ves i stap).
view.lblStatusPartlyTranslated: Sampela wok i no yet (__lastadapted__ bilong __versecount__ ves olgeta i gat trenslesen teks).
view.dscGetStarted: Welkam long Adapt It Mobile! Yu laik mekim nupela projek o kopi projek?
view.dscProjectSourceLanguage:
Step 1: Source Language
Enter the name and code of the source language. If you are unsure, click on the Lookup Codes button.
view.dscProjectTargetLanguage:
Step 2: Target Language
Enter the name and code of the target language. If you are unsure, click on the Lookup Codes button.
view.dscProjectFonts:
Step 3: Fonts
Specify the fonts and colors for the source, target and navigation text.
view.dscProjectPunctuation:
Step 4: Punctuation
Specify the punctuation mappings for the source and target languages, and whether to automatically copy the punctuation from the source to the target language when adapting.
view.lblPunctuation: Type in each punctuation character in the source language, followed by the corresponding character in the target language.
view.lblCases: Enter the lower and upper case equivalencies for the source and target languages below.
view.lblSourceHasUpperCase: Source contains upper and lower case
view.dscOpenProject: Enter the web address of the project you want to open.
view.dscCopyProject: Kopi projek long existing project from another device.
view.lblRTL: Teks i save stat long han sut na i save ron i go long han kais
view.lblNoAutoCapitalization: Yu no laikim Adapt It i mekim kapitel na smol leta long taget teks
view.ttlFilter: Makim USFM na Filta bilong Maka
view.lblFilteringDefault: No senisim USFM na filta bilong maka
view.dscProjectCreated: The project "__name_" was successfully created. Press Continue to import documents from the source language __souce__.
view.dscImportDocuments: Select the document files you want to copy from the local device. These can either be source language documents in USFM format or Adapt It documents in .xml format.
view.dscErrImportFirstChapterFirst: this is a collaboration document; please import the first chapter before importing this chapter.
view.dscNoDocumentsFound: No available files found on device. Please copy files onto the device and try again.
view.ttlReset: Setim basic seting i go long defol
view.dscReset: Yu laik setim basic seting i go long defol? Selektim "Yes" sapos yu laik senisim basic seting i go long defol. Selektim "No" sapos yu no laik senisim oldpela seting yu wokim pinis.
view.dscAdaptContinue: Yu pinis trenslesen: __chapter__. Yu laik opim neks sapta?
view.dscUserCanSetFilter: Teks bilong "__marker__" maka i ken kamap insait long wok trenslesen.
view.dscUserCannotSetFilter: Teks bilong "__marker__" maka i no inap kamap insait long wok trenslesen.
view.hlpdscAdaptPage: This page is where you will translate the source text to the target language.
view.hlpttlSelectOne: Click to select a single word
view.hlpdscSelectOne: To translate a single word, click on that word and start typing the word's translation in the target language.
view.hlpdscSelectMultiple: Drag over several words to select them and translate them as a group.
view.hlpdscPlaceholder: If the translation needs a word or phrase in the target language that doesn't exist in the source language, click on the Placeholder button to insert the target word or phrase.
view.hlpdscRetranslation: If the syntax of exegesis of the adaptation is incorrect or misleading, you can select the words and click the Retranslation button. This allows you to enter your own translation for the selected phrase
view.hlpdscPhrase: Click the Phrase button to group the selected words together so they can be translated as a single unit.
view.hlpdscPrevNext: Click the Previous and Next buttons to accept the current translation and move to the next or previous untranslated word.
view.hlpdscBack: When you are done, click on the Back button to return to the home screen.
